name: IMDb Compact - Movie Page + GM Tweaks v.30
description: Reorganize the Movie Page to watch all the principals Infos without scrolling. Hover for more detailed info or Using Gm panels. Remove "PRO" things.. Add too some tweaks for some useful Greasemonkey userscripts. News: This one (Same version, in different places): - IMDb Compact - Movie Page + GM Tweaks [GreasyFork] - IMDb Compact - Movie Page + GM Tweaks [Userstyles World (USw] - IMDb Compact - Movie Page + GM Tweaks [Usertstyles.org]

user.name: decembre
user.about: I build Userstyles principally for : - Firefox. - WideScreen (1920x1080) adaptation (More things in the window, less scrolling) - Dark Gray style (better for night surfing) - Site Navigation (Tweaks its Interface by moving many things) - ByPass Sites Limitations Some example: - Flickr' Userstyles by decembre - Userstyles : Userstyles TableView+Enhancer - Dark-Grey - Mozilla : Mozilla Addon Widescreen - Yahoo : Yahoo New Mail - Simply Dark And Gray - YouTube: Youtube WideScreen (New Design Polymer) - Streaming : Stream - DuckDuckGo - Streaming Helper - T√©l√©vision: T√©l√©rama WideScreen - New design - Search: DuckDuckGo - Multi-Columns GooGle - Multi-Columns Dark and Gray Note: Due to Userstyles.org limitation, some of my userstyles are minified (to reduce their size) by this online tool: CSS Minifier But now they are unreadable easily, sorry. You can watch their readable userstyle on Usertyles.World [USw] (or better use it!), because USw have not limit size when you post Many of my Userstyle are published on Userstyles.World [USw] too : Decembre [Userstyles.World [USw] It's a new site with a great accessibility and no limitation in size for the userstyle posted. I use some useful things like... Addon / extensions: Userscripts : Decembre - My Favoris [GreasyFork] Just for info (deprecated): ‚òÖ MY ‚òÖ Installed ‚òÖ GM ‚òÖ Surf (USO Mirror) FireFox Addons : Decembre Favorite Add-ons I try to adapt/create some Greasemonkey script: in GreasyFork. By example: - USERSTYLES - TABLES Sorter SIMPLE - Flickr - AUTO More Mini Thumbnail in Photo page Some my userstyles are published here too, by example: - Flickr WideScreen - BigONE I publish my tweaks here: Decembre's Pastebin I spend a lot of time on Userstyles but too: - Flickr and my pools in it: > Portrait‚òÖFaces > Portrait‚òÖFaces‚òÖOpen Minded

additional_info: Reorganize the Movie Page to watch all the principals Infos without scrolling. Hover for more detailed infos or Using Gm panels. With it, You test test too (Same Version in different places): - IMDb Compact - New Names Page [GreasyFork] - IMDb Compact - New Names Pages [Userstyles World (USw] - IMDb Compact - New Names Pages [Usertstyles.org AND: - IMDb - Dark and Gray Simple [GreasyFork] - IMDb - Dark and Gray Simple [Userstyles World (USw)] - IMDb - Dark and Gray Simple [Userstyles.org] Add support for some useful Greasemonkey userscripts : - IMDb: Link 'em all! by buzz: Adds all kinds of links to IMDb, customizable! - IMDb-Scout-Mod by Purfview : Adds too all kinds of links to IMDb, customizable! - IMDB bigger thumbnails/images/poster on chart pages by Alistair1231(2022): "Edits image url to get the full size picture and increases poster size" v.0.3: Need to add to it (request done): // @include https://www.imdb.com/* My adaptation is to reduce the full size cover (take to much place for me) to see them with an addons which can preview big images on hover. - Add movie ratings to IMDB links [adopted] by joeytwiddle (2022): Seems worked fine for language set to English. but not display its ratings very well when the page is set to an other language: It try to fix that since v - [Seems Broken - 2022] IMDB Video Player - 2embed (play streaming videos from IMDb) by Guillaume Marteau: IMDB Video Player - 2embed, Adds 2embed.ru streaming videos on IMDB webpages so you can watch it live ! Changes: >> 30: - Style some others pages too: Charts / Feature / Search >> v.27: - FIX - Support for mobile version on desktop / OLD Layout for Movie page... - Fix for GM "Add movie ratings to IMDB links [adopted]" - correction for Series - Tags moved Top / Right - Support for new code change in IMDb - 06.02.20022 - Support Images Viewer. - Make the userstyles more robust against code Changes.... test link: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt18258584/ - Fine tuning for GM "IMDb: Link 'em all!" And GM "Lecture en Streaming de films et s√©ries IMDb". - Corrections for GM "IMDb-Scout-Mod" Screenshots with details v.7: https://i.imgur.com/CHeHY9D.jpeg Old Screenshots (but are informative): https://i.imgur.com/l3z9ccL.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/ElrhGUr.jpeg
